snippet: George Lucas, Herb Alpert, Allen Toussaint, Renée Fleming and Tony Kushner are among this year’s recipients of the National Medal of Arts. National Humanities Medals will go to Marilynne Robinson, Kay Ryan, Anna Deavere Smith and Joan Didion,...
abstract: George Lucas, Herb Alpert, Allen Toussaint, Renée Fleming and Tony Kushner are among this year’s recipients of the National Medal of Arts. National Humanities Medals will go to Marilynne Robinson, Kay Ryan, Anna Deavere Smith and Joan Didion, among others.

headline.main: Obama to Present Arts and Humanities Medals on Wednesday
headline.print_headline: Obama to Present Medals for Arts and Humanities
